properties.description: Beadles Tea Room is a not-for-profit community space in the heart of our village. All are welcome, we are totally inclusive. No purchase is necessary, pop in and sit in the warm and maybe have a natter.
properties.title: Beadles Tea Room

properties.address: 9 Love Lane, Romsey, Hampshire S051 8DE S051 8DE
properties.description: We mainly cater for Unpaid Carers and the person's they care for, but we also welcome all and are children and dog friendly. We Provide free WIFI and use of our Laptops for the public. We also have board games, coloring books, craft activities. We provide support, information and signposting. Refreshments are available.
properties.title: Leanne Cooper

properties.description: We support people affected by cancer, both patients and family members. A special place of calm which offers a chance to relax and a variety of services for individuals and small groups. Services available for cancer patients and their families.
